body:
for hpctoolkit.

I have one question.  This PR requires a 1-line change to
cbtf-argonavis and cbtf-krell to specify the old version (no longer
the default or only version).

Should I add that to this PR or create a separate PR?

ping @scheibelp 

ping @jgalarowicz since this affects Open Speedshop.
But the change will be invisible with the two 1-line changes above.
title: libmonitor: update to version 2018.07.18 and add variant to configure
